name: Gerson Therapy Carrot Juice
description: Organic, fresh-pressed carrot juice is one of the main recipes used in the cancer-fighting Gerson Therapy diet.

name: Sweet Pea Microgreen Smoothie
description: This tasty green smoothie is packed with an amazing amount of nutrients courtesy of its star ingredient, sweet pea microgreens.

name: Shrimp, Avocado, and Egg Chopped Salad
description: Shrimp is high in protein and low in calories, making it an ideal alternative to beef and chicken.

name: Vanilla Berry Smoothie Bowl
description: Thick and creamy berry protein smoothies served in a bowl, topped with fresh fruit and granola.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Mashed avocado spread over crusty whole-wheat bread, finished with olive oil, red pepper flakes, and flaky sea salt—does it get much better than that?

name: Herb Omelette with Fried Tomatoes
description: Omelette Vegetables are foods that are simply prepared and can be prepared for breakfast and enjoy it.

name: Clam Chowder
description: Clam chowder is easier to make than you think – and the homemade version is unbelievably creamy, flavourful and chockfull of clams.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Fettuccine Alfredo is perfect for any and all occasions, from busy weeknights to romantic dinners.  It's simple, elegant, and totally delicious.
